name: 1Ramp
body:
This release contains
 - Leaderboard of 1ramp contests
 - Contest Create Feature
 - Vote value of each voter in posts
 - Fix drafts

name: 1ramp-beta
body:
What's New:
- Create and host contests
- Participate in exciting contests
- Bug fixes and improvements

name: 1Ramp-beta
body:
This release includes:
 - Resteem indicator in posts
 - Improved notifications
 - Improvement in feeds
 - In-app app update notifications.
 - Bug fixes

name: 1ramp Android Alpha v0.0.18
body:
This update includes:
 - Explore tab for posts
 - All posts are shown in the user profile section
 - Bug fixations

name: 1ramp Android Alpha v0.0.17
body:
- Fix crash issues detected in v0.0.16
- User event reporting made reliable
- Improve notification redirects

name: 1ramp Android Alpha v0.0.16
body:
This updates include:
 - Push Notifications
 - Profile Update
 - HF20: Resource credit information
 - Bug fixes

name: 1ramp Android Alpha v0.0.15
body:
- Updated App Design
 - Feature to delegate steem power
 - Username autocomplete feature in transfer page
 - Bug fixes

name: 1ramp Android Alpha v0.0.14 revision 2
body:
- User suggestions in transfer page
 - Bug fixes
 - App improvements

name: 1ramp Android Alpha v0.0.13 revision 2
body:
This update includes:
 - Transfer 
 - Claim reward balance
 - Power Up
 - Power Down
 - Bug Fixations

name: 1ramp Android Alpha v0.0.13
body:
### What's new
- Now you can reply on comments.
- View replies on comments.
- Performance improvements and bug fixes.

name: 1ramp Android Alpha v0.0.11
body:
This Release includes:
 - bug fixes
 - followers/following list

name: Hapramp Android Alpha 0.0.10
body:
- Fix major crashes
- Ability to edit communities
- Image upload retries
- Add terms of service

name: Hapramp Android Alpha 0.0.7
body:
*Features Included*
 - User Posts in the profile section.
 - User feeds [posted via hapramp].
 - Curated feeds in different communities.
 - Feedback collection mechanism using email.
